episodes.description: This time we introduce "Japan Railway Journal." The show reveals the attractive points of "Next Generation Shinkan-sen." The train has advanced facilities and state-of-the-art technologies.
episodes.title: Doki Doki! NHK WORLD-JAPAN

episodes.description: This time we introduce "Kawaii International," which shows various "home made kawaii goods" such as hair clips with miniature dolls, appetizing confectionery-shaped soaps. All can be made at home.
episodes.title: Doki Doki! NHK WORLD-JAPAN

episodes.description: This time we introduce "Trails to Oishii Tokyo," which shows the astounding world of Japanese Bread. The episode shows sushi made with bread instead of rice and artistic character-like bread.
episodes.title: Doki Doki! NHK WORLD-JAPAN

episodes.description: This time we introduce "Japanology Plus," which shows behind the scenes of laundry services. Stubborn stains are removed and huge number of shirts are pressed. All are done by crafts and technologies.
episodes.title: Doki Doki! NHK WORLD-JAPAN

episodes.description: This time we introduce "BENTO EXPO," which shows various BENTOs made by people outside Japan. One of them is peanut butter feature lunch by Americans, another is herb BENTO by Thais.
episodes.title: Doki Doki! NHK WORLD-JAPAN

episodes.description: This time we introduce "DESIGN TALKS plus," which shows local landscape of Manazuru, Kanagawa prefecture. Inhabitants set 69 regulations and rules to preserve the landscape of their town.
episodes.title: Doki Doki! NHK WORLD-JAPAN

episodes.description: This time we introduce "Core Kyoto," which shows amulets in Kyoto. Some are in traditional shapes and some are installed in IC chips to be able to connect to smartphones or smart-watches.
episodes.title: Doki Doki! NHK WORLD-JAPAN

episodes.description: This time we introduce "TOKYO EYE 2020." It shows the activity of Hinohara Village, Tokyo, trying to recover from COVID-19 shock. They make mask cases and perfume with Hinoki cypress in their village.
episodes.title: Doki Doki! NHK WORLD-JAPAN

episodes.description: This time we introduce "3-Day Dare*Devils." It shows the experience of a Chinese social media icon learning the job of Yumori, hot spring maintenance expert. He struggles in snow to master the job.
episodes.title: Doki Doki! NHK WORLD-JAPAN

episodes.description: This time we introduce NHK WORLD-JAPAN's new program "The Signs." This episode shows various roles of "avatar" in this "COVID-19 period," such as working in the office or attending the events.
episodes.title: Doki Doki! NHK WORLD-JAPAN

episodes.description: This time we introduce "Castle Quest." It shows the defence ability of Hikone Castle, the national treasure. It has a bridge which forces the enemy detour and the wall which endures the cannon balls.
episodes.title: Doki Doki! NHK WORLD-JAPAN

episodes.description: This time we introduce "Kawaii International" It shows. "The world of sneakers," such as a vintage of \800,000 making a buzz on social media and a cleaning service making old ones brand-new-like.
episodes.title: Doki Doki! NHK WORLD-JAPAN

episodes.description: This time we introduce "Journeys in Japan." The traveler visits Tsugaru in Aomori prefecture trying to play the part of the hero in "Jikabuki," the local Kabuki produced and played by local people.
episodes.title: Doki Doki! NHK WORLD-JAPAN

episodes.description: This time we introduce "Spiritual Explorers," which visits Kitakami area, Iwate Prefecture. There we find plenty of legends on "Oni," The Japanese Ogre. Two travelers meet surprising facts on "Oni."
episodes.title: Doki Doki! NHK WORLD-JAPAN

episodes.description: This time we introduce "Core Kyoto," which shows "Kimono Revolution." A new wave is weaving global tastes into orthodox fabrics, coordinate with western-style and employ different fields' materials.
episodes.title: Doki Doki! NHK WORLD-JAPAN

episodes.description: This time we introduce "Trails to Oishii Tokyo," which shows dishes of shark meat in Japan. We explore shark-fishing in Tsugaru Strait and have some traditional shark dishes in Aomiri Prefecture.
episodes.title: Doki Doki! NHK WORLD-JAPAN

episodes.description: This time we introduce "Ground Detective Simon Wallis," which reveals the mystery of whale fossils found in dry land. Simon Wallis, a Ground Detective and a professor, reveals from shaved ice dessert!
episodes.title: Doki Doki! NHK WORLD-JAPAN

episodes.description: This time we introduce "Maiko-san Chi no Makanai-san," the anime series on NHK WORLD-JAPAN. The life and friendship of a Maiko and a live-in-cook in Kagai in Kyoto is presented in the series.
episodes.title: Doki Doki! NHK WORLD-JAPAN

episodes.description: This time we introduce "Japan Railway Journal" which reveals the attractiveness of some cars debuted in 2020. There're Japanese-style wooden-furnitured cars and viewing cars with wide windows.
episodes.title: Doki Doki! NHK WORLD-JAPAN

episodes.description: This time we introduce "CYCLE AROUND JAPAN," which shows the reality of "Shinjuku Tiger." Cyclist Paul visited him at Kabuki-cho in Shinjuku and reveals why a man become "Shinjuku Tiger."
episodes.title: Doki Doki! NHK WORLD-JAPAN

episodes.description: This time we introduce "J-Arena," which reals the unknown effect of Tai Chi, a Chinese martial art widely practiced as a health exercise in Japan. The show tells its effect not known generally.
episodes.title: Doki Doki! NHK WORLD-JAPAN

episodes.description: This time we introduce "3-Day Dare*Devils," which shows the challenge of Ayatar, Thai influencer trying to master the technique of Japanese falconer. Will he master the technique in just 3 days?
episodes.title: Doki Doki! NHK WORLD-JAPAN

episodes.description: This time we introduce "Japanology Plus," which guides the world of Ukiyo-e. Peter Barakan, MC of the show, learns reading a story from a paint and experiences drawing an Ukiyo-e.
episodes.title: Doki Doki! NHK WORLD-JAPAN

episodes.description: This time we introduce "TOKYO EYE 2020," which shows various types of robots adopted in our life. One patrolls in a building and one is warm and has some weight to be loved as a pet.
episodes.title: Doki Doki! NHK WORLD-JAPAN

episodes.description: This time we introduce "no art, no life plus," which shows a barber in Oita prefecture carving masks from materials arrived the beach such as driftwoods or wasted fishing tools.
episodes.title: Doki Doki! NHK WORLD-JAPAN

episodes.description: This time we introduce "Core Kyoto," which shows the attraction of town-houses in Kyoto. Jeff Burglund, the presenter who lives in a town-house himself, visits houses and finds wisdom of Kyoto people.
episodes.title: Doki Doki! NHK WORLD-JAPAN
